card.name: Question #1
card.question: The word 'dinosaur' means what?

card.name: Question #2
card.question: In which periods were dinosaurs around?

card.name: Question #3
card.question: The Era from 260 million years ago to 65 million years ago is known as what?

card.name: Question #4
card.question: Name two events that might have led to the extinction of the dinosaurs.
card.answer: A massive asteroid impact or huge volcanic activity

card.name: Question #5
card.question: What is the name of a person who studies dinosaurs?

card.name: Question #6
card.question: The first dinosaur to be formally named is what?

card.name: Question #7
card.question: A meat-eating dinosaur is known as what?

card.name: Question #8
card.question: A plant-eating dinosaur is known as what?

card.name: Question #9
card.question: Was the Tyrannosaurus Rex a carnivore or a herbivore?

card.name: Question #10
card.question: Was the Triceratops a carnivore or a herbivore?

card.name: Question #11
card.question: Was the Brachiosaurus a carnivore or a herbivore?

card.name: Question #12
card.question: Was the Brontosaurus a carnivore or a herbivore?

card.name: Question #13
card.question: Was the Velociraptor a carnivore or a herbivore?

card.name: Question #14
card.question: The Stegosaurus had what type of defense?
card.answer: Spikes on its tail and plates on its back.

card.name: Question #15
card.question: What type of defense did the Triceratops have?

card.name: Question #16
card.question: How many horns did a Triceratops have?

card.name: Question #17
card.question: True or False: Pterodactyls were dinosaurs.

card.name: Question #18
card.question: Birds are descended from a type of dinosaur known as what?

card.name: Question #19
card.question: On which part of today's Earth did the T-Rex live?

card.question: How heavy could a T-Rex be?

card.name: Question #21
card.question: How long is a T-Rex skull?

card.name: Question #22
card.question: In which period did the T-Rex live?

card.name: Question #23
card.question: In which period did the Velociraptor live?

card.name: Question #24
card.question: How tall did were Velociraptors?

card.name: Question #25
card.question: In which period did the Triceratops live?

card.name: Question #26
card.question: What was the range of the weight of an adult Triceratops?

card.name: Question #27
card.question: How many teeth did a Triceratops have?

card.name: Question #28
card.question: The Brontosaurus is also known as what?

card.name: Question #29
card.question: In which period did the Brontosaurus live?

card.question: What was the Brontosaurus' average weight?

card.question: In which period did the Diplodocus live?

card.question: How many vertebrae were in a Diplodocus' tail?

card.name: Question #33
card.question: Name three members of the Sauropod family.

card.name: Question #34
card.question: How many pounds of plants did a Brachiosaurus eat per day?

card.name: Question #35
card.question: Was the Stegosaurus a herbivore or a carnivore?

card.name: Question #36
card.question: In which period did the Stegosaurus live?

card.name: Question #37
card.question: How many plates were there on the back of a Stegosaurus?

card.name: Question #38
card.question: What helps us understand what the dinosaurs were like?

card.name: Question #39
card.question: Who came up with the word 'dinosaur'?
